comic.title: The Beginning
comic.description: The first episode of the series. By the way, you burn more calories sleeping than you do watching TV.

comic.title: More Comics
comic.description: A random description with dummy data to build the project. Did you know that the human heart creates enough pressure to squirt blood 30 feet?

comic.title: Another Comic!
comic.description: A mage, a warrior and a rogue walk into a bar. The bartender says, get the fuck out! They start to leave, then the bartender stops them and says 'No, I mean why is a rouge hanging out with a warrior?'
